reviews.review1: Everything was excellent. The conference motivated me even more to make important decisions in life. Looking forward to the next one!
reviews.review2: The conference exceeded my expectations. Kudos for the excellent organization, great atmosphere, and expert speakers who conveyed knowledge in a clear and inspiring way. Thank you for the opportunity to be part of such an event.
reviews.review3: I've never been to a better conference, either personally or professionally. This was truly an essential conference, which is a real rarity. I don't know if I've ever experienced a conference so powerfully, with all my senses. What a challenge you've set for everyone in the industry. And for yourselves for next year!
reviews.review4: All praise for the idea, for the excellently balanced selection of speakers, sequence, and complete realization. I am thrilled (and still am) with the energy and atmosphere that your team, together with the speakers, conveyed to all of us. Thank you. And thank you to your entire team for everything. I say this from the heart. Bravo!
reviews.review5: Just want to praise today's conference. It was excellent, different, and extraordinary: from the very idea and organization, through the choice of speakers, all the way to the healthy meal that was in line with the overall atmosphere. Today it's not easy to create something different that hasn't already been seen, so I can only thank you for this experience. Congratulations!
reviews.review6: I would like to thank you for the excellent organization of the Balance conference on behalf of our company. The five of us who had the opportunity to attend yesterday's event regularly participate in various conferences, and we all agreed that Balance was the most innovative, most interesting, and most relaxed conference we've ever attended. At a time when we're all under pressure and the pace of everyday life, the format that Balance offers is truly refreshing. We all needed this experience! Thank you for your effort, energy, and enthusiasm. We look forward to future editions and congratulate the entire MITA Group team.
reviews.review7: It was amazing and people really enjoyed it. The feedback I heard is excellent, and everyone says the conference is different from anything they've been to before. Congratulations, this is a bullseye!

findYourBalance2025.title: Find Your Balance
findYourBalance2025.description: A conference that helped hundreds of participants find balance between work and personal life, discover new stress management methods, and achieve personal and professional growth.
findYourBalance2025.aboutParagraph1: Around 1,750,000 people in BiH (one million in FBiH and about 750,000 in RS) have certain symptoms of post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD), and as many as 400,000 people suffer from PTSD. Mental illnesses in BiH are constantly on the rise and represent a serious problem, not only because of their frequency but also because their consequences are much more severe for those affected. In recent years, the number of people in our country suffering from PTSD, neuroses, phobias, and schizophrenia has increased.
findYourBalance2025.aboutParagraph2: The fast-paced lifestyle, unpredictable changes in the world and society, unstable business environments, and social media pressure additionally affect the psyche of BiH citizens. Balance has become necessary for harmonizing our physical, emotional, mental, and spiritual needs. Without it, we often lose direction and feel exhausted, irritable, and insecure.
findYourBalance2025.aboutParagraph3: Although it plays an increasingly important role and is in the focus of all target groups, life BALANCE in BiH still does not receive enough attention. There is no public dialogue or event that encompasses all aspects necessary for a balanced life.
findYourBalance2025.aboutParagraph4: That's why in May 2025, we organized the first BiH CONFERENCE dedicated to living in balance.
findYourBalance2025.targetAudience4: Anyone looking to improve quality of life
findYourBalance2025.galleryDescription: View moments from the Find Your Balance 2025 conference
findYourBalance2025.resultsParagraph1: The conference was organized at the highest level, from technical support and stage production, through carefully selected food tailored to the concept of health and balance, to personalized experiences for each participant. It included workshops, wellbeing content, and interactive zones that further enriched the overall experience.
findYourBalance2025.resultsParagraph2: The results were exceptionally strong: the conference generated great interest, tickets were sold out, a large number of sponsors joined, and the event received strong media attention and positive reactions from participants who recognized it as a unique and unprecedented conference experience in BiH.
findYourBalance2025.resultsParagraph3: Balance Conference 2025 wasn't just a conference ‚Äì it was a story about balance, inspiration, movement, mental and physical health, healthy eating, life purpose, wellbeing, meditation, and excellent organization. The story continues, as another Balance Conference is coming soon.

excellenceAwards.title: BALANCE EXCELLENCE AWARD
excellenceAwards.description1: Balance Excellence Award is an annual recognition for companies that systematically, authentically, and long-term implement work-life balance strategies, with the aim of improving employee wellbeing and sustainable business success. The award is presented within Balance Conference 2026, which will be held on April 16, 2026 in Sarajevo with the goal of:
excellenceAwards.goal1Desc: We highlight companies that lead in implementing work-life balance strategies
excellenceAwards.goal2Desc: We motivate organizations to adopt long-term employee wellbeing strategies
excellenceAwards.goal3Desc: We promote a culture that values people, not just performance
excellenceAwards.eligibilityTitle: WHO CAN APPLY AND JURY COMPOSITION
excellenceAwards.canApplyTitle: Balance Excellence Award applications are open to:
excellenceAwards.canApply1: Companies of all sizes (micro, small, medium, and large enterprises)
excellenceAwards.canApply2: Domestic and international companies operating in the region
excellenceAwards.canApply3: Companies from the private and public sectors
excellenceAwards.oneApplication: One company may submit one application.
excellenceAwards.juryTitle: Applications are evaluated by an independent expert jury, composed of:
excellenceAwards.jury3: Compliance, wellbeing, and organizational culture specialists
excellenceAwards.juryFinal: Jury decisions are final and irrevocable.
excellenceAwards.applicationSubtitle: You can apply in two ways:
excellenceAwards.videoContent1: Company's approach to work-life balance culture
excellenceAwards.presentationContent2: Specific measures and benefits for employees
excellenceAwards.presentationContent3: Work flexibility, wellbeing initiatives, leadership support
excellenceAwards.presentationContent4: How to track effects (surveys, KPIs, employee feedback)
excellenceAwards.presentationContent5: Examples of good practices and internal results
excellenceAwards.criteriaSubtitle: The independent expert jury will evaluate applications based on the following criteria:
excellenceAwards.criterion1Desc: Not declarative policies, but practices in everyday work
excellenceAwards.criterion3Desc: Employee voice, testimonials, culture of trust
excellenceAwards.criterion5Desc: Adapting to people's needs and modern ways of working
excellenceAwards.criterion6Desc: Clear success indicators and open communication about results
excellenceAwards.awardStep1: Applications from the top three companies will be briefly presented to the audience
excellenceAwards.awardStep2: Their key practices and results will be highlighted
excellenceAwards.awardStep3: Awards will be ceremoniously presented before conference participants and media. If no one from the awarded company attends the ceremony, the award will be delivered to the company's headquarters or sent by mail.
excellenceAwards.integrityDescription: The goal of Balance Excellence Award is to draw attention to employees and programs that companies implement to retain existing and attract new talent. We aim to set a regional standard, promote value and integrity, not commercial interest.
excellenceAwards.integrity1: Applying for Balance Excellence Award is free
excellenceAwards.integrity2: No fee is charged for participation in the competition or for receiving the award
excellenceAwards.integrity3: Participation in the Balance Excellence Award program does not require purchasing conference tickets

burnout.title: WHAT IS BURNOUT
burnout.definition: Burnout is a state of chronic mental, emotional, and physical exhaustion caused by prolonged, excessive stress, often caused by work, but also by parenting or caring for others, which leads to feelings of being overwhelmed, exhausted, and reduced effectiveness.
burnout.recoveryText: setting boundaries, managing stress, self-care, and seeking support.

aboutConference.tagline: True motivation is not here to push us to do more, but to live and work more consciously, more balanced, and more meaningfully.
aboutConference.quote: Motivation is the central theme of all conversations about talent retention in companies today, but also among employees who want to give their best without burning out too quickly.
aboutConference.intro: In a world where burnout is becoming more common, and balance is harder to achieve, we ask ourselves key questions about motivation, endurance, and success.
aboutConference.question1: How do you go to work with the same passion after 5, 10, 15, and more years in the same place?
aboutConference.question2: How do you endure in professional and personal life?
aboutConference.question3: How do you not succumb to pressure and burn out trying to do everything?
aboutConference.question4: How do you not disappoint as a partner or parent?
aboutConference.question5: How do you say 'no' without offending anyone?
aboutConference.question6: How do you be the best while staying balanced?
aboutConference.closingStatement: These and many other questions we answer at Balance Conference

howWeDoIt.paragraph2: We identify the problems that matter: stress, burnout, lack of purpose, performance pressure. Then, through expert-led talks and workshops, we provide practical tools that actually work.
howWeDoIt.paragraph3: This is not your typical conference. We create experiences that inspire, educate, and truly engage people. Every speaker has earned their place. They've walked the path, tested their methods, and have results to back it up. When they share their knowledge, it's not just information. It's insight, delivered with passion and generosity. You don't just listen.

findYourBalance.title: Find Your Balance
findYourBalance.paragraph1: Find Your Balance is a platform that empowers people in a multidisciplinary way. First and foremost, we identify contemporary challenges and personal difficulties that individuals face in everyday life and work.
findYourBalance.paragraph2: Then, through lectures and workshops, we provide concrete tools for stress management, finding purpose, and increasing productivity in a way that fulfills each individual.

howWeCreate.title: HOW DO WE CREATE EXPERIENCES?
howWeCreate.paragraph1: We don't organize typical conferences. We create experiences that inspire, educate, and entertain people.
howWeCreate.paragraph2: We invite only speakers with extensive work experience who use scientifically-based methods. Their lectures are based on relevant and verified data, as well as years of practice and research. Participants can feel this themselves while listening to the lectures, as every expert has a long and dedicated path behind them before becoming a speaker at Find Your Balance Conference.

ourGoal.title: OUR GOAL
ourGoal.description: We empower individuals through learning, personal growth, and self-confidence. Our goal is to increase the optimism index, help people find inner peace, set realistic goals they want to achieve, and improve productivity and satisfaction of target groups ‚Äì in the workplace, in the family, and in society as a whole.
